item.title: [Help] with end this code
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

You need to create more logical if statements. Use else, and else if. Also, the last if statement is out of the if(NPCID == 3307) brackets.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] with end this code
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

okay thanks now its wrong with this code. when i click on my npc its says “Sorry you need to be a donator to open this shop.” and “come back then you got 5k”

if(NPCID == 3307){
if(donator == 1){
sM(“Welcome to donator store.”);
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 10;
}
}
if(donator == 0){
sM(“Sorry you need to be a donator to open this shop.”);
}

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] with end this code
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

if(NPCID == 599) { if(donator == 1) { sM("Choose your character's look."); showInterface(3559); apset = true; } } else if(donator == 0) { if(playerHasItem(995, 5000)) { deleteItem(995, 5000); showInterface(3559); apset = true; sM("Choose your character's look."); } }

Try that. I was in a hurry.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] with end this code
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

You were right the second time, it’s } else {

Like this:

if(NPCID == 599){
if(donator == 1){
sM("Chose a new char look.");
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
}
}
if(donator == 0){
if(playerHasItem(995, 5000)){
deleteItem(995, 5000);
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
sM("Chose your char look.");
} else {
sM("Come back when you have 5K.");
}
}
}

Read full topic

if(donator == 1){
sM(“Chose a new char look.”);
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
}
}

showInterface(3559);
